name: 1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats 5
description:
Soapy cats do not get tired of hilarity! And the brain relentlessly demands a workout - the game "1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats 5" will help in this!

All things considered, so every player will choose for themselves the right level of difficulty. Convenient management, various hints, the ability to save.

- 500 high quality pictures
- Sophisticated game mode: easy tips, sorting and magnifier
- individual settings of difficulty of each puzzle allow you to play indefinitely
- function of switching off the rotation mode of puzzle pieces
- the ability to save and continue a puzzle at any time
- For those who like excitement - special tasks and colorful trophies
- pleasant relaxing music
- new part in the series of games
